name: The Field Trip Murders
description:
"The Field Trip Murders" is a "serial killer-themed" survival horror.
A simple school trip turns into a nightmare when a stranger decides to join in!"

You play as "Mia", a high school girl, on a trip with her friends and teachers. Mia's group arrives at the cabin later than the rest, but when they reach their destination, something seems off? do you care to find out what happened?

CONTROLS:

  • 'W','A','S','D' to MOVE AROUND
  • 'MOUSE' to LOOK AROUND
  • 'MOUSE LEFT CLICK' - ACTION
  • 'MOUSE MIDDLE' for INVENTORY

NOTE - The game should be played in 4:3 resolution.

UPDATE V1.1:

  • Fixed some collider issues
  • Fixed Camera controls

UPDATE V1.2:

  • Removed One Kill (Now, you'll get three hits before dying)
